dt: {bc}to give practical effect to and ensure of actual fulfillment by {d_link|concrete|concrete:1} measures
{bc}to provide instruments or means of expression for

quotes.t: … drew scattered snickers when he {qword}implemented{/qword} a dress code for Senate staffers …
States remain years behind in {qword}implementing{/qword} child support regulations …

A federal interagency group should develop and {qword}implement{/qword} a risk management strategy to reduce human exposure to dioxins and dioxin-like chemicals in food, says a report from the Institute of Medicine …

shortdef: carry out, accomplish; especially : to give practical effect to and ensure of actual fulfillment by concrete measures
to provide instruments or means of expression for
